title: Central Library - National Library Board Singapore
blurb: Visit the Central Library for books and resources.
description: The Central Library offers a wide range of books and resources for all ages. It features various collections, reading areas, and study spaces. The library is open daily and provides access to information and learning materials for families and individuals. Explore different genres, attend workshops, and enjoy a quiet reading environment. Perfect for families looking to spend quality time reading and learning together. The library also offers digital resources and online services for convenient access to information.
Keyword_tag: Library, books, reading, resources, learning, study space, information
full_address: 100 Victoria St, #B1-01 National Library / Lee Kong Chian Reference Library, Singapore 188064

title: Central Public Library - A Community Hub
blurb: A central hub for learning and community engagement.
description: The Central Public Library serves as a cornerstone for learning and community engagement. It offers a wide range of resources and services, including books, digital media, and various programs for all ages. The library provides a welcoming space for families and children to explore and discover new interests. With comfortable reading areas and dedicated children's sections, it's an ideal place for kids to foster a love for reading and learning. The library also hosts regular events and workshops designed to engage and educate the community, making it a valuable resource for families seeking enriching experiences.
Keyword_tag: Library, community, learning, books, reading, children, families, resources, programs
full_address: 100 Victoria St, #B1-01 National Library / Lee Kong Chian Reference Library, Singapore 188064

title: Central Public Library
blurb: Visit the Central Public Library for books and events.
description: The Central Public Library offers a wide range of resources and programs for children, teens, and adults. Explore various collections, including books, multimedia materials, and special exhibits. The library hosts regular events such as book discussions, storytelling sessions, workshops, and talks. Facilities include the Central Library Gallery, Children's Biodiversity Library by Singapore Oceanarium, Immersive Room, Memories Corner, and Singapore Alcove. A great place for learning and community engagement.
datetime_display: Friends and Neighbours Facing Loss as a Bereavement Companion 27 October 2025 Workshop Words of Wisdom - What Are Yours? 28 October 2025 Talk When Life Happens: Storytelling About Grief & Loss | Beyond Text 29 October 2025 Workshop Designing Your Life Hands-On Taster Session 29 October 2025 Book Discussion SWF 2025 Book Launch – Island in the World: Singapore’s Geopolitical DNA 01 November 2025 Previous Next slide 1 to 3 of 6 Experience Fantastical Tales | Central Library 18 October 2025 Storytelling Tamil Storytelling: ஜீம் , பூம் , பா
Keyword_tag: library, books, reading, events, workshops, talks, gallery, children, teens, adults
full_address: 100 Victoria St, #B1-01 National Library / Lee Kong Chian Reference Library, Singapore 188064

title: Central Public Library Activities and Workshops
blurb: Explore diverse events at the Central Public Library.
description: The Central Public Library hosts a variety of activities, workshops, and book discussions suitable for all ages. From storytelling sessions to talks on health and wellness, there's something for everyone. Families can enjoy reading programs, while adults can participate in book clubs and learning communities. The library aims to provide a space for lifelong learning and community engagement through its diverse range of programs and resources. These events foster intellectual curiosity and promote a love for reading and learning. The library also offers workshops on writing, personal development, and community support, catering to a wide range of interests and needs.
datetime_display: Various dates and times, see website for details
Keyword_tag: Library events, workshops, book discussions, storytelling, community activities
full_address: 100 Victoria St, #B1-01 National Library / Lee Kong Chian Reference Library, Singapore 188064

title: SGSecure Book Reading @ Central Public Library
description: Join us at the Central Public Library for an SGSecure Book Reading session. Experience fantastical tales in a safe and engaging environment. This event is perfect for families and children of all ages. Enjoy stories that spark imagination and promote community spirit. The Central Public Library offers a wide range of resources and programs for families, including books, workshops, and activities. This book reading session is designed to be both entertaining and educational, providing a fun and interactive experience for everyone. Come and discover the magic of reading with us!
Keyword_tag: Book reading, Central Public Library, SGSecure, Fantastical Tales, family event, children's activities
full_address: 100 Victoria St, #B1-01 National Library / Lee Kong Chian Reference Library, Singapore 188064

title: Central Public Library - Spacebar: write and share
blurb: Community space for writing and sharing activities.
description: The Spacebar at Central Public Library offers a community-focused environment for writing and sharing. It hosts workshops and provides a collaborative space for individuals interested in writing and literature. Activities include writing workshops and community sharing sessions, catering to a broad audience interested in creative expression and literary arts. The venue aims to foster a vibrant community of writers and readers.

title: Central Public Library - Activities and Programs
blurb: Explore a variety of programs at Central Library.
description: The Central Public Library offers a wide range of activities and programs for all ages, including storytelling sessions, book discussions, talks, and community events. These programs aim to promote literacy, learning, and community engagement. Families can enjoy interactive storytelling sessions, while adults can participate in book clubs and informative talks. The library provides a welcoming space for individuals and families to explore the world of books and ideas. The Central Public Library is a great place for families to spend time together and learn new things. The library also hosts special events and exhibitions throughout the year, providing even more opportunities for learning and discovery. The Central Public Library is committed to providing a diverse range of programs and services to meet the needs of the community.
